import { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addContact } from '../Redux/action'; function ContactForm() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [form, setForm] = useState({ first_name: "", last_name: "", // mob: "", status: "active" }) const handleChange = (e) => { console.log('eeeee',e.target.value) setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } function handleSave() { dispatch(addContact(form)) } return (
